name: Himmatbhai Shamaldas Shah Shasan Seva Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Aadarsh  Amdavad is an active registered trust (NGO) since 2002 nurturing society at a large with transparent administration , having its 65 various activities by contribution and dedication of 900+ volunteers at 175+ given premises, where no casts, religion and age bar. Conducting useful training certificate courses like Yoga Teachers, Life Management, Nursery Teachers , Basic Computer and Tailoring etc. and many others like Youth leadership ,  Child development , Parenting for peace .Having free 9 operative medical Homeopathy clinics , 42 Yoga centers, 10 Computer centers and Acupressure treatment centers. Arranging free social activities like Blood Donation Camp , Eye check up and Cataract Operations , Tree Plantation , Unused clothes and household items collection/ Distribution at end user. Our goal and aim is to spread vitally free activities at every corner of the city and to promote skilled person through the platform in the next few years
